hero.title: Launch your vision with Cofoundly.

hero.heading: Free discovery call - Ignite your journey

hero.footer: Limited spots available - reserve your session now!

sections.title: Universe of complexity?

features.title: Unleash your startup's potential
features.subtitle: Transition from concept to market-ready in just 24 hours — a process that typically takes at least 12 weeks. Start your journey with a robust foundation crafted by experts.

sections.title: Your digital foothold
sections.description: Launch with a landing page engineered for engagement and conversion. Designed to captivate and connect with your audience, our mobile-responsive pages ensure a seamless user experience, ready for transactions and optimised for discovery.
sections.footer: *Note: The screenshot serves as a conceptual demo to illustrate potential outcomes.

image.alt: A screenshot of the landing page

sections.title: Your operational command center
sections.description: Step into your mission control with a web app that embodies efficiency and scalability. Our pre-built platform comes equipped with the core functionalities essential for your startup's growth, designed for high performance and an intuitive user experience.
sections.footer: *Note: This foundational app requires customisation to fully realise your unique vision.

image.alt: A screenshot of the web app

sections.title: Your automated communication array
sections.description: Maintain stellar relations with your audience through automated, brand-cohesive emails. From user authentication to account updates, our email systems are designed to keep your users informed and engaged without taxing your focus.
sections.footer: Elevate your startup's communication with a system that's responsive, reliable, and reflective of your brand's identity.

image.alt: A screenshot of the transactional emails

faqs.title: Your questions, answered.
faqs.subtitle: Find quick answers to common queries and get closer to launching your vision.

sections.question: What exactly does a 'technical co-founder as a service' mean?
sections.answer: It means providing technical expertise and support akin to what a co-founder would offer, including building the product, guiding technical strategy, and ensuring scalable infrastructure.

sections.question: How quickly can we get started once we sign up?
sections.answer: The process begins immediately after the initial discovery call, with the digital presence ready within 24 hours post-consultation.

sections.question: Can you handle the full development cycle of a product?
sections.answer: Absolutely. We manage the entire development cycle from ideation to launch and maintenance.

sections.question: What kind of support can I expect after the initial setup?
sections.answer: We offer ongoing support packages including updates, enhancements, and technical maintenance.

sections.question: Is the starter kit fully customisable?
sections.answer: Yes, the starter kit is a flexible foundation that can be customised to your brand and functionality needs.

sections.question: Are there any hidden costs?
sections.answer: We value transparency. All costs for the initial setup are straightforward, and any additional costs will be clearly discussed and agreed upon beforehand.

sections.question: What if I only need a landing page and not the full app development?
sections.answer: We provide flexible solutions tailored to your needs, whether that's just a landing page or full-scale development.

sections.question: How do you ensure the security and privacy of our data?
sections.answer: We adhere to industry best practices, secure coding standards, regular audits, and compliance checks to safeguard your data.

cta.title: Ready to launch your startup's success?
cta.description: Take the first step into a broader universe. Schedule your complimentary discovery call today and let's plot the course to make your vision a reality. With expert guidance and a swift 24-hour setup, your startup will be ready to take on the market with confidence. Don't let your ideas stay grounded.
cta.footer: *Hurry! Only a few slots left for this month. Claim your free session valued at $250 and secure your spot today.

image.alt: A 3d illustration of a rocket landed on the moon
